scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin artist.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/artist.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin aftercare.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aftercare.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
